String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过？

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过？

String.Source: How well did you know Elandir?
String.Dest: 你有多了解兰迪尔？

String.Source: How well did you know Elandir?
String.Dest: 你有多了解兰迪尔？

String.Source: You aren't exactly my type.
String.Dest: 你完全不是我喜欢的那种类型。

String.Source: You aren't exactly my type.
String.Dest: 你完全不是我喜欢的那种类型。

String.Source: First we have to get you out of these robes.
String.Dest: 首先我们得让你把这些长袍什么的脱下来。

String.Source: First we have to get you out of these robes.
String.Dest: 首先我们得让你把这些长袍什么的脱下来。

String.Source: I'm sorry, I'm going to have to pass.
String.Dest: 对不起，我必须要过去。

String.Source: We're going to need whips, chains, and a live pheasant.
String.Dest: 我们现在需要鞭子，锁链，和一只活山鸡。

String.Source: We're going to need whips, chains, and a live pheasant.
String.Dest: 我们现在需要鞭子，锁链，和一只活山鸡。

String.Source: How do you know what I want?
String.Dest: 你怎么知道我要什么？

String.Source: I'm just here for Lorne's key.
String.Dest: 我到这儿只不过是为了洛恩的钥匙。

String.Source: I'm just here for Lorne's key.
String.Dest: 我到这儿只不过是为了洛恩的钥匙。

String.Source: What did you tell Lorne?
String.Dest: 你给洛恩说什么了？

String.Source: What did you tell Lorne?
String.Dest: 你给洛恩说什么了？

String.Source: What did you tell Lorne?
String.Dest: 你给洛恩说什么了？

String.Source: What did you tell Lorne?
String.Dest: 你给洛恩说什么了？

String.Source: Who do you think I'm after?
String.Dest: 你以为我在跟踪谁？

String.Source: Who do you think I'm after?
String.Dest: 你以为我在跟踪谁？

String.Source: Who do you think I'm after?
String.Dest: 你以为我在跟踪谁？

String.Source: Get in the bed and I'll show you.
String.Dest: 到床上去，我会展示给你看的。

String.Source: Get in the bed and I'll show you.
String.Dest: 到床上去，我会展示给你看的。

String.Source: What kind of services do you provide?
String.Dest: 你提供什么服务？

String.Source: Why don't you tell me what I want.
String.Dest: 你为啥不告诉我那些我想知道的呢？

String.Source: Why don't you tell me what I want.
String.Dest: 你为啥不告诉我那些我想知道的呢？

String.Source: Deneris spoke of one named Elandir. Who was he?
String.Dest: 丹尼勒斯提到一个叫兰迪尔的人。他是谁？

String.Source: What's Lorne's role in all this?
String.Dest: 洛恩在这里扮演了什么角色？

String.Source: What's Lorne's role in all this?
String.Dest: 洛恩在这里扮演了什么角色？

String.Source: I knew him like I know all my patrons. Intimately.
String.Dest: 我与他熟识，正如我认识我所有的顾客。

String.Source: You are quite lovely. I think I will enjoy our time together.
String.Dest: 你太可爱了。我想我会享受我们相处的时光的。

String.Source: I love a forceful woman. Let's not waste another minute talking.
String.Dest: 我喜欢强硬的女人。别浪费时间瞎扯淡了，快让我们进入正题吧。

String.Source: Over here, handsome. Let me get a good look at you.
String.Dest: 到这儿来，帅小伙儿。让我好好看看你。

String.Source: A man blinded by his desire to teach. He loved his pupil, and failed to see the Daedra in the darkness.
String.Dest: 有人因对传授知识的热忱而失明了。他给予他的学生太多的爱以至于没能看到那隐藏在黑暗中的魔族。

String.Source: Elandir lived a long life, and so have I. It's not uncommon for those who cling to darkness to share the same shadow.
String.Dest: 兰迪尔活了很久，我也是。依附于黑暗的人们共享同一片阴影这并不奇怪。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: But the one you seek is a ghost. For that man denied my offering, and only the dead earn that distinction.
String.Dest: 但你要找的那个人是个幽灵。他还拒绝了我的贡品，而且只有死人才会赢得这样的荣誉。

String.Source: Yet Lorne persisted. I offered him my body. He wanted the book. Men are always finding new ways to disappoint you.
String.Dest: 可洛恩很坚持。我要把身体给他。他却要他的书。男人总是有新鲜的花样来让你伤心。

String.Source: The night is long, and there will be time for all your fantasies. The ones you think you know, and the ones you hide from yourself.
String.Dest: 长夜漫漫，有足够的时间留给你幻想。那些你认为你知道的，和你自己隐藏起来的。

String.Source: Some say I lead people astray. They say I make people betray their spouses. When all I really do is allow you to be true to yourself.
String.Dest: 有人说我把人们引入歧途。他们说我让人们背叛了自己的配偶，而我只是让你们忠于本心而已。

String.Source: I'm in the business of knowing. Everything you've done here you've done for a reason. Your eyes tell me the rest.
String.Dest: 我在知识的海洋里遨游。你在这所做的都是一个原因，至于其余的东西，你的眼睛都告诉我了。

String.Source: Name your pleasure, sera, and discover it for the first time.
String.Dest: 说说你的兴趣，先生，然后回味下它被重新挖掘时的感受。

String.Source: I have a feeling it's right in front of you.
String.Dest: 在你面前我就有一种感觉。

String.Source: He followed the trail here. For the final echoes of any man, whether they be spoken by tongue or quill, will always whisper my name.
String.Dest: 他一直跟踪到这里。无论是谁，无论他们的遗言是说出来的还是写出来的，永远都会呢喃着我的名字。

String.Source: Love, passion, desire...only through this body will you experience them as they were meant to be.
String.Dest: 爱情，激情，欲望...只有通过这具肉体，你才能如注定地一样经历它们。

String.Source: I don't know how Lorne died, but I know Elandir experienced pleasures few will ever know. It remains to be seen whether you will know the same.
String.Dest: 我不知道洛恩是怎么死的，但我知道兰迪尔心中腾起了鲜有人知晓的窃喜。剩下的问题就是你能否也察觉这点。

String.Source: Like all patrons you tell me your secrets, and I show you mine.
String.Dest: 就像所有的主顾一样，你把自己的秘密告诉我，我也告诉你我的秘密。

String.Source: That was amazing. There aren't many clients who can satisfy me.
String.Dest: 太厉害了！要知道没有多少客户能让我如此满足啊。

String.Source: I told him what I told Elandir, and what I will tell you. A dead man will never bring you pleasure.
String.Dest: 我把对兰迪尔说的话也对他说了，而我会再对你说一遍。杀人不是什么令人高兴的事情。

String.Source: Elandir took my advice. He abandoned his brothers and gave me his diary as proof.
String.Dest: 兰迪尔采纳了我的建议。他出卖了他的兄弟们，把他的日记给我作为证据。

String.Source: Lorne was like you. His desire blossomed from the seed of the dead, a journal written by Elandir Darksteel.
String.Dest: 洛恩也曾像你一样。他的欲望绽放于一颗死亡之种，一本由兰迪尔·玄铁所写的日记。

String.Source: I'm everyone's type. I grant all wishes. You simply don't know what to ask for.
String.Dest: 我是所有人都喜欢的类型。我能实现所有的愿望。你根本不知道该要什么了。

String.Source: Only I know what you truly desire. You chase the flesh of another. A dead man, like the one before you, and the one before him.
String.Dest: 只有我懂你真正的欲望所在。你渴求别人的血肉。你就是行尸走肉，就像你前面的那个一样，就像他前面的那个一样。

String.Source: Only I know what you truly desire. You chase the flesh of another. A dead man, like the one before you, and the one before him.
String.Dest: 只有我懂你真正的欲望所在。你渴求别人的血肉。你就是行尸走肉，就像你前面的那个一样，就像他前面的那个一样。

String.Source: Only I know what you truly desire. You chase the flesh of another. A dead man, like the one before you, and the one before him.
String.Dest: 只有我懂你真正的欲望所在。你渴求别人的血肉。你就是行尸走肉，就像你前面的那个一样，就像他前面的那个一样。

String.Source: Only I know what you truly desire. You chase the flesh of another. A dead man, like the one before you, and the one before him.
String.Dest: 只有我懂你真正的欲望所在。你渴求别人的血肉。你就是行尸走肉，就像你前面的那个一样，就像他前面的那个一样。

String.Source: Only I know what you truly desire. You chase the flesh of another. A dead man, like the one before you, and the one before him.
String.Dest: 只有我懂你真正的欲望所在。你渴求别人的血肉。你就是行尸走肉，就像你前面的那个一样，就像他前面的那个一样。

String.Source: Such a shame. The things I would've shown you...
String.Dest: 真可惜。我明明都已经给你展示过了...

String.Source: I think you're the type who likes to role play. You wear different masks, because you know not your own face, nor your own desire.
String.Dest: 我想你大概是那种喜欢扮演别人的家伙。你带着不同的面具，因为你根本不清楚你自己的脸长成什么样，也不清楚你想要的究竟是什么。

String.Source: I love a forceful man. Let's not waste another minute talking.
String.Dest: 我喜欢强硬的男人。别浪费时间瞎扯淡了，快让我们进入正题吧。

String.Source: It's obvious. You desire Lorne, who wanted Elandir, who thought only of another.
String.Dest: 很明显。你渴望洛恩，那个想要兰迪尔的人，那个只想着另一个家伙的人。

String.Source: Only an experienced lover would be able to do what you just did. Or a talented one.
String.Dest: 只有一个阅历丰富的情人才能做到你刚才做的事。亦或是个才华横溢的天才。

String.Source: Finally, someone who knows what they want. And yet you still know nothing.
String.Dest: 终于有人知道他们想要什么了，而你却一无所知。

String.Source: You know not what you're here for. And how could you, having never known my touch.
String.Dest: 你根本不知道你来这里的目的是什么。还有，你怎么能完全不知道我。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。
